    main

Pre-Process alt_counts_df for Safety Population

Source: R/utils.R
alt_counts_df_preproc.Rd

If alt_counts_df is not NULL, will check for required variables and filter to include only safety population, then apply tern::df_explicit_na().

alt_counts_df_preproc(alt_counts_df)

Arguments

alt_counts_df

(character) alternative (full) dataset (typically ADSL) used only to calculate column counts.

Examples

adsl <- scda::synthetic_cdisc_dataset("rcd_2022_10_13", "adsl")
alt_counts_df_preproc(adsl)
